tool.name: TerrestrialFlow

param.name: Output_raster
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename for the output raster.

param.name: Study_area_mask
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input study area mask shapefile.

param.name: Flow_direction_raster
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input flow direction raster. This can be found in the output folder of the Preprocess DEM tool.

tool.summary: This tool uses a flow direction raster and a mask of the study area to produce a map showing the terrestrial flow of water at the boundary of the study area. The flow can either be going into the study area, out of the study area, or along a ridgeline.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool uses a flow direction raster and a mask of the study area to produce a map showing the terrestrial flow of water at the boundary of the study area. The flow can either be going into the study area, out of the study area, or along a ridgeline.
